body_html:
That looks like a Bazel bug to me. Are you using the latest version of Bazel? If so, we should file a bug for Bazel.

I have previously built XLA on Mac, although there is currently no continuous build for XLA on Mac so it may have bitrotted.

body:
That looks like a Bazel bug to me. Are you using the latest version of Bazel? If so, we should file a bug for Bazel.

I have previously built XLA on Mac, although there is currently no continuous build for XLA on Mac so it may have bitrotted.
